jobDescription: Position: Data Scientist Duration: Full Time Location: Union, NJ Position Scope:Client is looking for a Data Scientist with a strong background in Forecasting. The role is responsible for modeling complex planning problems and identifying forecasting opportunities through the use of statistical, algorithmic, machine learning, mining and visualization techniques. In addition to advanced analytic skills, the role requires proficiency in working with complex, large and varied data sets. Data scientists will partner with cross functional teams from Ecommerce, Merchandising, Marketing, Supply chain, Operations, Finance and other IT teams to drive the business. They need to be creative - propose innovative ways to look at problems, validate their findings using an experimental and iterative approach. Data Scientists will possess strong programming knowledge to be able to quickly model using analytical tools, and present their findings in a clear and structured manner. They would have strong written and oral communication skills.
